name: Jumper (Asimuth)
description:
The Jumper Series. Originated from a comic i wrote, and it got it's first installment in 2017. Features a living Jumper, whose name is... Jumper! Later, still in 2017, Jumper 2 came out. Eventually 2018 would bring Jumper 3, and Jumper 4 would arrive in 2019. Since then, there have been a lot of scrapped projects, but the latest attempt at making a game, Jumper 5 has an actual demo playable. Eventually, i would take down Jumper games, because i wanted to remake it, but failed miserably, thus i'm now re-releasing it.

You can download all the Jumper games here. It Includes the first 4 installments, + Jumper 5 Demo, and older versions of Jumper games, and some remakes.
